name: Friday Night Funkin' - Tord: Complete Edition
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' - Tord: Complete Edition
description:
This is where you can face off against Tord, the main villain of Eddsworld from the eddisode: The End.

LORE TIME:
BF loves Eddsworld, their famous YouTube animated channel that gained 1 million subs! It takes place after Week 6, after they defeated Senpai and got out of the game, GF once told: "You wanna watch Eddsworld with me tonight?", "Yeah!" BF answered.
Tonight, they're watching the finale of Eddsworld Legacy called: THE END, Daddy Dearest stalks at him for BF & GF watching the eddisode, he had an idea to get rid of BF by using his demon powers to suck both BF & GF into a video, kinda like Senpai when they both got sucked into a game, that's when they met Tord!
